titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-27, by Mr. Gingrey.
Waives a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII for a two-thirds vote.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 16.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 897, H. Res. 181 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for consideration of a bill relating to the rights of an incapacitated person or persons.
